thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 6 of 45
thread.title: Adrian

author: Adrian
title: Adrian
text: We have a manual Espresso machine but we felt the need of a faster coffee in the morning. For us capsule machines are out of the question. We even considered a Miele built-in machine. After browsing Whollattelove we decided to try a Gaggia Brera. We got a good offer just before Christmas. We are more than happy with the Brera. We do not use the steam wand for frothing since a French Press froths faster and better. All this at a tiny fraction of the cost of the Miele build-in.
